articles.description: It was already confirmed that Oti Mabuse and Aljaž Škorjanec were leaving, but which pros will be back this year?
articles.content:
A selection of the returning Strictly Come Dancing professional team
Strictly Come Dancing has announced the full line-up of professionals wholl be returning for this years series.
Back in February… [+2185 chars]
